about_the_game:
Step into the world of Limitless with our exciting demo! Experience two unique quests (~40 to 1 Hour of Game Time) —one alongside companions and one solo. Discover the game's innovative mechanics and engage in its breathtaking combat. Are you ready to explore the possibilities?

Limitless is an open-world, third-person, story-driven action RPG set in the mystical Realm of Eternity. Experience a richly crafted high-fantasy universe filled with danger, discovery, and dynamic gameplay.

Build Your Dream Team of Heroes

Lead a squad of four remarkable companions, each with their own strengths, skills, and customizable gear. Strategically swap between characters in real-time to overcome challenges, solve mysteries, and turn the tide of battle in your favor.

 Master the Art of Combat with Weapon Stances 

Revolutionize your battles with our cutting-edge weapon stance system. Instantly switch between powerful combat styles to counter enemies, adapt to changing battlefields, and unleash devastating attacks that will leave your foes in awe.

Conquer Puzzles with Elemental Power

Engage your mind and creativity with clever puzzles that demand mastery of the elements. Unlock hidden paths, discover ancient treasures, and bring light to the darkest corners of the Realm.

Unleash the Power of Dynamic Combat

Experience combat like never before with fluid, multi-layered mechanics that allow for limitless creativity. Harness the power of elemental abilities, devastating combos, and unique strategies to dominate your enemies and carve your own path to victory.

Dive into a Decade of Legendary Storytelling

Immerse yourself in a tale of epic proportions, meticulously crafted over ten years. Follow Dayton, the wielder of an ancient relic, as he battles the interdimensional Ravi army and uncovers the secrets of the Elemental Crystal Fragments in a race to save the Realm from total annihilation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64-bits Version 21H2
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen5 1500X or faster processor
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960 4GB or AMD 380X 4GB or Higher

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Master dynamic combat with a revolutionary weapon stance system, solve elemental puzzles, and lead a team of unique heroes in a battle against the Ravi to save a world on the brink of destruction.
